text: The Adventures of Hajji Baba is a 1954 American adventure movie directed by Don Weis and based on the 1824 novel The Adventures of Hajji Baba of Ispahan by James Justinian Morier. It stars John Derek, Elaine Stewart, Thomas Gomez, Rosemarie Bowe, Joanne Arnold and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Don Weis Category:Movies set in Iran Category:Movies set in the 18th century
title: The Adventures of Hajji Baba
